Title: The masses of the United Headquarters have been hoodwinked and are without crime, it is glorious to turn one's weapon around and strike!
Designer: Red Flag Commune of the "Shanghai Art Department" of the Worker-Peasant-Soldier Film Studio (《上艺司》工农兵电影制片厂红旗公社)Red Flag Corps of the "Publishing Department" of the Shanghai Municipal Print Technology Research Office (《版司》上海市印刷技术研究所红旗兵团)
